channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Road sign fallen to dangerous height on Aldebert Terrace, 18th September
item.description:
A road sign on the south side of Aldebert Terrace near the junction with South Lambeth Road, just before the Canton Arms pub, has fallen down its supporting pole and is now at a dangerous head height with a sharp metal edge

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49, Aldebert Terrace, Stockwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 sofas ababdoned and several green waste bags behindvthem behind tge fence keep reporting sunce may 2024, 18th September
item.description:
There are 2 big sofas tipped on kelvington Road bect to tge Brenchley Gardens. Behind them just behind the fence there are several bags left by the company working in Brenchley Gardens hired by southwark council. These bags are thete since may 2024 and reported 11 times already! Now people keep tipping more bags on tge top of the old ones.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelvington Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping , bins overflowing, rats, 18th September
item.description:
Bins stored on pavement, they need to be removed asap. They don’t belong to a particular property and it’s encouraging people to fly tip next to the bins. Dreadful smell, rodents, public health issue

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brooke Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 18th September
item.description:
It is every week I’m having to report the same issues and it’s becoming tiresome, when are the council going to put up cameras to solve this problem it’s not hard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Strathnairn Street, Bermondsey, London

item.title: You have installed a trench across the whole road but failed to properly backfill it., 18th September

item.title: Large hole in road, 18th September
item.description:
This hole has now been here 6+ weeks with no work being done. It has been reported before yet nothing has been done. No license and no idea who dug the hole. It juts out into the road causing delays and is dangerous . Why was the previous report closed with nothing done???

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, Mottingham Road, Mottingham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic bollard, at the north end of Peckham Grove and near Newent Close ., 18th September
item.description:
This bollard doesn't have a padlock. On a few occasions now I have cycled past and the bollard has been removed and discarded by the side of the road. I reported this a month or so ago and if the padlock was replaced it's now missing once again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Peckham Grove, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
